snippet: Former Representative Mel Reynolds failed to appear for his arraignment on federal tax charges Monday in Chicago.
abstract: Former Rep Mel Reynolds of Illinois fails to appear at arraignment in Chicago on federal tax evasion charges.
lead_paragraph: Former Representative Mel Reynolds failed to appear for his arraignment on federal tax charges Monday in Chicago.

headline.main: Illinois: Ex-Congressman Is No-Show at Arraignment
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Ex-Congressman Is No-Show at Arraignment
